thread.section_title: Palm Gallery Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Relaxen Holiday
thread.title_full: Relaxen Holiday - Review of Palm Gallery Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: peterQ3162TI
title: Relaxen Holiday
text:
We liked our staying very much at the hotel because it was very quiet despite the nearness of the pulsating life of the city - and a charming place including very friendly staff is a very good reason to come back.
Part of the hotel was a working area, 5 new rooms waiting to be finished, and some very small inconveniences not to be noticed led to 4 from 5 stars.
I would recommend it for people who need a quiet and nice place to linger, not far from the vibrant heart of the city, which we really enjoyed.
